title: march 10: coke or pepsi?
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the secret recipe behind Coca-Cola. After, she remembers a notable lawsuit over the song “Blurred Lines.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
